Paragraph: In these animals , abecarnil produced a paralleled dose - dependent ( 0 . 05 - 1 mg / kg i . p . ) reduction of both motor behavior and cortical [ 35S ] TBPS binding .

| --- |
| abecarnil |

Explanation:

* "abecarnil" is a benzodiazepine derivative and has been used in research as a potential anxiolytic and muscle relaxant.
* "[35S] TBPS" is a radioactive compound used in research as a ligand to study the GABA receptor.
